summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Go Fish game - all requested features working correctly. Tested menu layout, navigation, tutorial system, fish encyclopedia, game mechanics, and UI polish features.
passed_tests: Menu screen - Winter/season button positioned at bottom of screen
Menu screen - PLAY button successfully navigates to stage select
Stage Select - Tutorial button visible and clickable
Stage Select - Fishdex button visible and clickable
Tutorial - 5-step child-friendly tutorial with emojis and simple text
Fishdex - 6 fish displayed in Pokedex-style grid with 0/6 discovery counter
Game screen - CAST button text fits proportionally with smaller font
Game screen - REEL button appears with appropriate smaller font when fish bites
Game screen - Bobber visible but positioned behind water layers (correct z-index)
Navigation - All BACK, CLOSE, and Menu buttons working correctly
UI responsiveness - All buttons clickable and responsive
Visual polish - Smooth animations and transitions throughout
Game mechanics - Fishing sequence (cast -> wait -> bite -> reel) working properly
